channel.title: Almost there?
channel.description:
Well, ive just set up my server. Got a source to host, portforwarded, downloaded the portchecker from portforward.com
I checked my port and it says my port is open. So i run my server, check on rune locus and it says my server is offline.
Any tips?

item.title: Almost there?
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
